content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) with coal as fuel and currently full inventory (50/50 items).

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.5, -50.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (-15.5, -50.5)) that extracts iron ore.

### Wood extraction area at position (4.125, 22.875) and (2.4375, 27.375)
Consists of the following entities:
- Tree (position (4.125, 22.875)) that provides wood.
- Tree (position (2.4375, 27.375)) that provides wood.

### Coal extraction area at position (40.5, -82.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Coal patch (position (40.5, -82.5)) that provides coal.

### Iron plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) that produces iron plates from iron ore.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure that the inventory of the furnace is not full before attempting to insert items. Check the current inventory status before each insertion.

### Errors when crafting coal
- Verify that you have the necessary raw materials to craft coal. Coal is a raw resource that must be gathered, not crafted from other items.

### Errors when inserting iron ore
- Ensure that you have iron ore in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnace. Check your inventory status to confirm available resources.

### Errors when harvesting
- Make sure to harvest from the correct resource patch and ensure you have enough space in your inventory to collect the harvested items.

### General inventory management
- Regularly check your inventory to avoid attempting to insert items when full. Prioritize clearing out unnecessary items to make space for essential resources.
